alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Southwest Mountains; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 3:03AM MST until December 29 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. The combination of snow and blowing snow will lead to poor visibility, especially through mountainous terrain. * WHERE...Western Mountains, Northwest Plateau, Northwest Highlands, and West Central Plateau. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed and icy road conditions. This includes portions of Interstate 40 and U.S. Highway 550. Travel could be difficult at times with low visibility and areas of blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Southwest Mountains; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau
